title: How to write an excuse letter for not attending school activities - Quora

response.answer_text: Not knowing your situation, your age, country, type of school, this may or may not work. But try this: Dear ____________ (principal, teacher, professor — use the formal Mr. or Ms. and their last name) I am unable to attend __________________ (activities) on ____________ date. Unfortunately, I am ______________________ (insert reasons: disabled, have a funeral to attend, my mom says I can’t, it goes against my religious beliefs, I’m mentally disturbed, my dog ate my homework, etc., etc.) I appreciate your understanding. Sincerely, (Your name) Good luck!

Well I hope you have good handwriting and they don’t notice that it’s your spelling. Dear (insert name here) Please exuse (your name here) from attending (activity) as he/she is having some very difficult times at home right now and is experiencing some serious social anxiety issues and being in that kind of atmosphere will cause him/her to be very ill and possibly have to be hospitalized. I do hope you understand and can keep this to yourself. I very much appreciate your help and hope that (insert your name here) will be able to participate in the future. As it stands (your name here) cannot attend (activity) for the foreseeable future but hopes to soon. I can customize it for you for whatever you need but I gotta have more info. Hope this helps

You can write in different method for not attending school activities. First of all you can ask the permission to your school principal. Then principle will advise you to write an excuse letter. Firstly there will be a column in a dairy to write a letter for principal. You can write a letter there in your dairy .or else you can write through a letter in a sheet paper. Format for writing letter to the principal from: ABC To: The principal sub: content: yours faithfully :

Date Dear Mrs. _________, Please excuse _________ from school activities on _____. He/she will make up any missed work. If you have any questions, please feel free to call me. ___ ___-____ Sincerely, __________________
